name: Dragon Ball Galaxy Explorers
description:
-Controllers:

-Player 1:

  • W/S: Movement
  • D:Shoot

-Player 2:

  • Up/Down: Movement
  • Right:Shoot
  • You can use XInput for Player 2

It has 3 characters (Goku, Goku Black and Vegeta), each one of them are "empty" characters which you can upgrade.

The game right now consists of dodging asteroids and defeating bosses (Majin Boo and Cell), when their health reduces to 75%, 50% and 25% they drop one ZCoin (3 per boss), when you defeat them you get 5 Z Coins, which means each boss can drop 8 Z Coins

Z Coins are used to upgrade your characters, Health (You can receive more damage before losing), Strength (You deal more damage) and Ki/Energy (You can shoot more "bullets")

It has autosave each time you go to main menu.
